::Feline::

She smiled and walked with him.  She rested her head on his shoulder 
as they walked down the hall. She purred softly in his ear. Despite 
the fact that this was all an assignment to gather info for Zardus, 
she was starting to actually like HotRod.  She felt a slight tug at 
her spark for him.  She smiled, she wondered if after her mission was 
over, she could keep HotRod.  But then again, he was a maximal.  She 
thought about that chip. Yeah, she thought, that chip would let her 
keep him.

She walked with him, holding onto his arm.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "I'll join you." He started walking to her lab.
>
